item.title: Research
item.description: Bridging the Gap Between Theory and Data Link to heading A core assumption of quantitative empirical research is that models reflect the theories being tested. However, the research methods available are often an imperfect fit to theoretical concepts. My research works to reduce this difference by finding new ways to approach the relationship between concepts and quantities (1-6). This work asks two questions: How do we move from semantic understandings to models and representations?
